verses.verse: The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H4427>reigns;<s%> let the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7264>tremble:<s%> he <S%H3427>sits<s%> between the <S%H3742>cherubim;<s%> let the <S%H776>earth<s%> be <S%H5120>moved.<s%>
The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is <S%H1419>great<s%> in <S%H6726>Zion;<s%> and he is <S%H7311>high<s%> <S%H5921>above<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people.<s%>
Let them <S%H3034>praise<s%> your <S%H1419>great<s%> and <S%H3372>terrible<s%> <S%H8034>name;<s%> for it is <S%H6918>holy.<s%>

The <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H5797>strength<s%> also <S%H157>loves<s%> <S%H4941>judgment;<s%> you do <S%H3559>establish<s%> <S%H4339>equity,<s%> you <S%H6213>execute<s%> <S%H4941>judgment<s%> and <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> in <S%H3290>Jacob.<s%>
<S%H7311>Exalt<s%> you the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H7812>worship<s%> at his <S%H1916>footstool;<s%> <S%H7272><s%> for he is <S%H6918>holy.<s%>

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> among his <S%H3548>priests,<s%> and <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> among them that <S%H7121>call<s%> on his <S%H8034>name;<s%> they <S%H7121>called<s%> on the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and he <S%H6030>answered<s%> them.
He <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to them in the <S%H6051>cloudy<s%> <S%H5982>pillar:<s%> they <S%H8104>kept<s%> his <S%H5713>testimonies,<s%> and the <S%H2706>ordinance<s%> that he <S%H5414>gave<s%> them.

You <S%H6030>answered<s%> them, O <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God:<s%> you <S%H1961>were<s%> a <S%H410>God<s%> that <S%H5375>forgave<s%> them, though you took <S%H5358>vengeance<s%> of their <S%H5949>inventions.<s%>
<S%H7311>Exalt<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H7812>worship<s%> at his <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H2022>hill;<s%> for the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> is <S%H6918>holy.<s%>
